rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed with a colonial aesthetic featuring arched doorways. This space flows into an adjoining living area that includes built-in seating areas for relaxation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, this dining area is designed with natural lighting and colonial elements like wooden finishes and decorative moldings. It respects Vastu principles by orienting the seating towards the east.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed with modern amenities while retaining colonial charm. The placement ensures a balance with the dining area and living space as per Vastu for energy flow.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A private suite located near the rear of the house to serve household needs while maintaining respect for privacy. Designed with basic colonial finishes and adequate ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet and Utility Closet
rooms.description: A functional space adjacent to the entrance for guests. The utility closet is integrated into this area.

openings.location: Front facade aligned with east-west axis per Vastu for auspicious entry.
Attached to the side of the house, easily accessible and designed to connect to the interior.
Leading out from the living area to a covered balcony that overlooks the garden, ensuring optimal sunlight per Vastu guidelines.
Strategically placed in each room for ventilation and natural light as per colonial design aesthetics and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom features a private ensuite bathroom and large windows facing the garden. The layout is designed for privacy with colonial elegance.

rooms.name: Children's Room
rooms.description: A spacious room featuring natural light and colonial style finishes to foster a peaceful environment for children.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Integrated with the master bedroom ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.location: Centrally located to connect ground floor and first floor efficiently while preserving spatial balance per Vastu guidelines.
Multiple windows in each bedroom for optimum ventilation and natural lighting in accordance with colonial design and Vastu principles.
